geomatics.drawing.geometries

Class ToolTriangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • geomatics.drawing.geometries.ObjectFundamentals
      • geomatics.drawing.geometries.ToolTriangle

  • public class ToolTriangle
extends ObjectFundamentals
    Class for TollTriangles that stores triangle coordinates and provides methods for creating drawable triangle geometries for the ToolDrawPanel, or for importing/exporting the triangle coordinates. Inherits from ObjectFundamenals.
    Author:
    heol1015

      Stores the first, middle and last ToolPoint of a ToolTriangle object
